title: In memory postgress

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

An extension that add embedded sql library ([zonkyo](https://github.com/zonkyio/embedded-postgres)) as quarkus service

The idea is to copy the code available in this [location](https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-apps/tree/main/persistence-commons/quarkus-postgresql-inmemory-parent) to the quarkiverse

### Repository name

quarkus-postgresql-inmemory

### Short description

embedded in-memory sql library based on zonkyo

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/<REPOSITORY_NAME>/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- postgresql
- zonkyo
- embedded db
...


### Team Members

- ftirado
- cristianonicolai


### Additional context

_No response_
